title: The Race to Save New York's Crumbling Infrastructure
description:
From Penn Station to the Brooklyn-Queens Expressway (BQE), these are some of New York City's most pressing multi-billion dollar infrastructure projects.
For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

0:00 - Intro
00:33 - LaGuardia Airport
09:02 - Brooklyn-Queens Expressway (BQE)
18:00 - Hudson Tunnel Project
25:59 - Penn Station
36:47 - Second Avenue Subway
45:31 - Interborough Express

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/
